name: Super Mario 64: Gore/Hard-Mode
storyline: Bowser has once again kidnapped Princess Peach, and it's up to Mario to collect all 120 Power Stars and rescue her from Bowser's claws! This time, however, the journey won't be so forgiving...
summary: Take a dive into the challenging world of Gore/Hard-Mode! Often called "Real life Mario 64", this mod originally started as a port of Kaze's Unfair Mario 64. It quickly grew into a cursed lovechild between Unfair Mario and 'I Wanna Be The Guy' sporting ridiculous obstacles and gory inspiration from both. Be prepared to die numerous times in unexpected ways!
